member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.Login(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks if the specified provider user id represents a valid account. If it does, log user in.
member.param: if set to true create persistent cookie as part of the login.
member.returns: true if the login is successful.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.CreateOrUpdateAccount(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates or update the account with the specified provider, provider user id and associate it with the specified user name.

member.summary: Gets the registered user name corresponding to the specified provider and provider user id.

member.summary: Gets all OAuth & OpenID accounts which are associted with the specified user name.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.HasLocalAccount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether there exists a local account (as opposed to OAuth account) with the specified userId.
member.param: The user id to check for local account.
member.returns: true if there is a local account with the specified user id]; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.DeleteAccount(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Delete the specified OAuth & OpenID account

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.TryGetOAuthClientData(System.String,Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.AuthenticationClientData@)
member.summary: Tries getting the OAuth client data of the specified provider name.
member.param: The client data of the specified provider name.
member.returns: true if the client data is found for the specified provider name. Otherwise, false

member.summary: for unit tests

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.SerializeProviderUserId(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Securely serializes a providerName/providerUserId pair.
member.returns: A cryptographically protected serialization of the inputs which is suitable for round-tripping.
member.remarks: Do not persist the return value to permanent storage. This implementation is subject to change.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.WebPages.OAuth.OAuthWebSecurity.TryDeserializeProviderUserId(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Deserializes a string obtained from back into a providerName/providerUserId pair.
member.param: Will contain the deserialized provider name.
Will contain the deserialized provider user id.
